00010 #include "connectionmsgblock.h"

00020 connectionMsgBlock::connectionMsgBlock(long long code, class partDetails &pd){
00021 
00022     data = new unsigned char[DATASIZE];
00023     unsigned char *data_p = data;
00024 
00025     // Copy the code to the data buffer
00026     memcpy(data_p, &code, sizeof(code));
00027     data_p += sizeof(code);
00028 
00029     // Copy the timestamp
00030     time_t ts = pd.getTimestamp();
00031     memcpy(data_p, &ts, sizeof(time_t));
00032     data_p += sizeof(time_t);
00033 
00034     // Copy the MSISDN
00035     memcpy(data_p, pd.getMSISDN(), partDetails::MSISDNSIZE);
00036     data_p += partDetails::MSISDNSIZE-1;
00037     
00038     // Copy the Gift Id
00039     unsigned char gid = pd.getGiftId();
00040     memcpy(data_p, &gid, sizeof(unsigned char));
00041     data_p += sizeof(unsigned char);
00042 
00043     int crc = crc32.getCRC(data, DATA_WO_CRC);
00044     memcpy(data_p, &crc, sizeof(int));
00045 }
00046 
00053 connectionMsgBlock::connectionMsgBlock(unsigned char *newdata) {
00054     data = new unsigned char[DATASIZE];
00055     memcpy(data, newdata, DATA_WO_CRC);
00056     int crc = crc32.getCRC(data, DATA_WO_CRC);
00057     memcpy(data + CRC_OFFSET, &crc, sizeof(int));
00058 }

00066 bool connectionMsgBlock::operator==(connectionMsgBlock &cmb) {
00067     unsigned char *data2 = cmb.getData();
00068     int crc1 = this->retrieveCRC();
00069     int crc2 = cmb.retrieveCRC();
00070 
00071     
00072     if (memcmp(data, data2, DATASIZE) == 0 && (crc1 == crc2))
00073         return true;
00074     else
00075         return false;
00076 }

00082 unsigned char *connectionMsgBlock::getData() {
00083     return data;
00084 }
00085 
00091 connectionMsgBlock::~connectionMsgBlock(){
00092     delete data;
00093 }

00100 int connectionMsgBlock::retrieveCRC() {
00101     int crc;
00102     memcpy(&crc, data +CRC_OFFSET, sizeof(int));
00103 
00104     return crc;
00105 }
00106 
00113 bool connectionMsgBlock::isValid() {
00114     int crc = retrieveCRC();
00115 
00116     int compcrc = crc32.getCRC(data, DATA_WO_CRC);
00117     if (crc == compcrc)
00118         return true;
00119     else
00120         return false;
00121 }

00129 pair<long long, partDetails> connectionMsgBlock::getParticipant() {
00130     partDetails pd;
00131 
00132     long long code;
00133     time_t ts;
00134     char msisdn[12], gid;
00135 
00136     unsigned char *data_p = data;
00137 
00138     // Copy the code
00139     memcpy(&code, data_p, sizeof(code));
00140     data_p += sizeof(code);
00141 
00142     // Copy the timestamp
00143     memcpy(&ts, data_p, sizeof(time_t));
00144     data_p += sizeof(time_t);
00145     pd.setTimestamp(ts);
00146 
00147     // Copy the MSISDN
00148     memcpy(msisdn, data_p, partDetails::MSISDNSIZE);
00149     data_p += partDetails::MSISDNSIZE-1;
00150     pd.setMSISDN(string(msisdn));
00151 
00152     // Copy the Gift Id
00153     memcpy(&gid, data_p, sizeof(char));
00154     pd.setGiftId(gid);
00155     
00156     return pair<long long, partDetails> (code, pd); 
00157 }
00158 
00166 pair<string, partDetails> connectionMsgBlock::getParticipantStr() {
00167     pair<long long, partDetails> t = getParticipant();
00168 
00169     stringstream code;
00170     code << t.first;
00171     return pair<string, partDetails>(code.str(), t.second);
00172 }
